pages.text: Urban areas mainly consist of high-rises and recreational spaces. Some buildings have food on display both from the mod and from vanilla Minecraft.$(br2)This list goes into further detail about certain buildings from specific Rider series.

pages.title: West Washing Shop Kikuchi
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider 555 (2003, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)2-6 leather (60% x2) (in 3 double chests)$(li)1 leather cap, leather tunic, leather pants, or leather boots (10% x2) (in 3 double chests)$(br)$(li)1-2 $(l:misc/items/foods#transform_one_shot)Transform One-Shots$(/l) (60% x2) (in 3 double chests)$(li)1 $(l:faiz/items/mission_memories#faiz_mission_memory_toy)Faiz Mission Memory (Toy)$(/l) or $(l:faiz/items/mission_memories#kaixa_mission_memory_toy)Kaixa Mission Memory (Toy)$(/l) (20% x2) (in 3 double chests)
$(li)1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#justifaiz_music_disc)JustiÏ†'s Music Disc$(/l) (in a chest in the upstairs bedroom)

pages.title: Narumi Detective Office
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W (2009, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)6 gold $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_g)Unrefined Memories$(/l), 5 silver $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_s)Unrefined Memories$(/l), and 1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#w_b_x_w_boiled_xtreme_music_disc)W-B-X ~W-Boiled Extreme~ Music Disc$(/l) (in barrels in the underground bunker)

pages.title: Antique Shop Omokagedo
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Wizard (2012, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)4 iron ingots, 12 iron nuggets, 4 $(l:wizard/items/magic_stones#wizardgem)Orange Magic Stones$(/l), and 1 $(l:wizard/items/wizard_gem_crafting_chisel)Gem Chisel$(/l) (in a chest)

pages.title: Donut Shop Hungry
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Wizard (2012, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)12 $(l:misc/items/foods#donut)Donuts$(/l), 2 $(l:misc/items/foods#vienna_coffee)Vienna Coffee$(/l), and 1 $(l:misc/items/foods#mayo)Mayo$(/l) (in a chest)$(li)2 $(l:misc/items/foods#donut)Donuts$(/l) and 1 $(l:misc/items/foods#vienna_coffee)Vienna Coffee$(/l) (on display)

pages.title: Nascita
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)4 $(l:misc/items/foods#coffee)Coffee$(/l) (on display)$(li)5 $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottles$(/l) and 5 $(l:build/items/smash_bottle)Smash Bottles$(/l) (in a barrel in Sento's lab)$(li)1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#be_the_one_music_disc)Be The One Music Disc$(/l) (in a barrel under the hidden staircase)
